title: Man accused of raping girl appears in court
content: A suspected rapist appeared in court Saturday. (WKRC)      CINCINNATI (WKRC) - A suspected rapist appeared in court Saturday.    Stanley Stokes is accused of raping a girl under the age of 13. The victim reportedly knew Stokes before the alleged incident.    Court documents say the 32-year-old attacked the girl earlier this week while she was sleeping.    Stokes is locked up in the Hamilton County Jail. He's being held on $350,000 bond.
